overview: Kris Blent is the man with the magic mirror – not to mention the insatiable sexual appetite! – who arrives in Prague filled with countless memories of some of the hottest, horniest man-on-man encounters imaginable. Luckily for him, there’s no chance that he’ll forget anything – the mirror provides a constant reminder of every sordid little detail. Noah Matous, Jaro Stone, Florian Mraz and new boys, Matthew Paris and Mickey Rush, prove that when it comes to fairy stories, the ones with cute guys, big cocks and lots and lots of spunk are most definitely the best!
title: The Mirror
